result.title: Code Monk (Bit Manipulation)
result.content:
Hello everyone,

I want to invite you to participate in HackerEarth's Code Monk Contest(Bit Manipulation). It is a 3 hour long contest scheduled on 19th April at 15:30 UTC. To check your timezone, click here.

The link to the contest: here

The problem set consists of 5 algorithmic tasks with partial solutions allowed — you get points for every test that your solution passes. The problem set has been prepared by pulkit_180894. They have been tested by rivudas, and the editorials are presented by me.

Also, top 3 newbie winners to get HackerEarth T-shirts in each Code Monk challenge!

To learn more about Bit Manipulation — click here

Good luck everyone! :)

Update: Contest will get started in 15 minutes. See you on leader board!
